website_summaries.verdict: When a bit of comfort food is just what the doctor ordered, this slow casserole cooker is here to save the day.
pros: Perfect size for chicken breasts, lasagna, desserts, and casseroles
Heats evenly with the same temperature options as deeper slow cookers
Latches lock in place for carrying
Stoneware crock is removable and can be used in the oven
cons: Smaller capacity than other slow cookers and will not hold larger roasts
Unit does get hot, so handle with pot holders

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than a regular casserole dish
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. I expected the actual cooking area to be like a 9 x 13 casserole dish but it is not that big. It will work for what I am using it for...just me and my husband. Not big enough to use for a larger family.
customer_reviews.author: Missouri Gal

customer_reviews.title: from oven to warmer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to keep casseroles warm at pot luck dinner at work. The crock can be removed and placed in oven to bake casserole- then take it out and place in warmer. It also works well when I cook the casserole in the the unit itself. I have not had any issues with this device and would recommend this product. Jo Ann
customer_reviews.author: Mona Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great design for taking covered dish to dinner party
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to have a better presentation than would be possible in a deep round crock pot. The pot itself was a hit due to the unique design---but it performed flawlessly in cooking the vegetables. We really like this device!
customer_reviews.author: Cerchier

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size for casseroles and other dishes, such as lasagna. I chose this over the crock pot version because I already have an oval Hamilton Beach slow cooker that I'm very happy with, plus the mechanism to hold the lid on looked more sturdy, and I think it is. It also is a more pleasant serving dish for pot lucks than a traditional crock pot.
customer_reviews.author: NJ9000

customer_reviews.title: We love this slow cooker
customer_reviews.text: Because this slow cooker is shallow it is much better suited to taking food to parties. My husband took meatballs to a block party and serving them from this was way better than a deep one. It does get hot on the outside but we were careful not to touch the hot areas. Also the insert is heavier than I anticipated so if you're weak, probably best to pass. I've used it several times and the results have all ben wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Am loving it
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this crock pot. The shallow depth is fine for the chuck roasts and chicken breasts I usually cook, and the shallow crock can go straight to the table. Am loving it.
customer_reviews.author: RCT

customer_reviews.title: Great for what it's for
customer_reviews.text: We made slow cooker green bean casserole in this for Thanksgiving, and it turned out better than the year before, when we made it in our regular slow cooker. This is handy for such recipes, and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not very deep
customer_reviews.text: Can hold your meal however when the juices/gravy begin to bubble you WILL have a large mess to clean up. The bottom is not deep at all.
customer_reviews.author: Denise McPhillips

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love this new size! I use this Slow Cooker at least once a week for casseroles, lasagna, etc. Works perfect. Super easy to clean too. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy A

customer_reviews.title: Family Size & Attractive For Serving From The Pot
customer_reviews.text: It’s everything I expected. If a family size slower cooker is what is needed, I recommend this one. So far...so good.
customer_reviews.author: Melba Yates

customer_reviews.title: Cooker
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, the light did not work that shows you the cooker is on.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality cooker works great for casseroles.
customer_reviews.text: Love this slow cooker. Works so nice for casseroles. I made lasagna in it and it worked great. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size and interlocking handles for transporting. Already recommended to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so nice. I live in a neighborhood that hosts a ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so nice. I live in a neighborhood that hosts a lot of pot lucks and this is perfect for keeping the food at perfect temperature all evening.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our needs. We are trying to fix more home cooked meals and this works perfectly. Thus far we have prepared baked beans, a pork shant and a roast. So easy and we like the casserole better than the deep pot shape.
customer_reviews.author: Victor C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Cook & serve in the same container!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to cook, transport and serve hot in the same container. Perfect! The only drawback is the weight: once the food is in the container and in the heating device, it is a handful.
customer_reviews.author: P. B. Maher

customer_reviews.title: Useful addition to our kitchen arsenal.
customer_reviews.text: Versatile and useful slow cooker. We have made lasagna and casseroles, and have heated hot dogs for a picnic. The lid clasps in place for easy transport to pot lucks. Controls are very simple (low - 8hrs, high - 4 hrs, warm). The baking insert can be used separately in an oven as well. Cleaning was very easy (wipe it out, put it in the dishwasher). Relatively compact, so easy to store away. Nice product that we enjoy using. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great way to slow cook casseroles or keep dips warm!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a long-time crockpot user, but never really saw a way to use a deep pot for casseroles. THis is perfect for that! Make lasagna, enchiladas, etc. without heating up the house! We work from home, and find it so much easier to cook ahead, so this has totally simplified our meal prep! It's also great that you can take the whole thing to potlucks or parties, and reheat & keep warm casseroles or dips! THe lid locks on tightly, preventing spills. You just have to heat up fully before turning down to warm if you're reheating foods.
customer_reviews.author: Smartly Created

customer_reviews.title: Oh, so useful
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use it for soups or stews as well as roasts and baking. It looks great too. Would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy

customer_reviews.title: A slow cooker that does its job
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I used a slow cooker. I made what was allegedly a pretty good chicken casserole. So this slow cooker must have done its job. Also, this slow cooker is simple to operate. The dial only goes Warm, Low, and High. The only problem is that there is no indication that the slow cooker is in operation until you notice the condensation, so you may have to be careful not to get burned.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ang

customer_reviews.title: works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing this months ago I finally had occasion to cook my mom's famous Swedish meatball recipe. The cooker was easy to use, easy to clean, and the meatballs turned out fantastically. That's the only thing I know how to cook in a slow cooker, and now I'm inspired to try more things. The only issue I have with this cooker isn't really an issue: it's too big! I'm a single person who lives alone and I don't entertain much. Hey, maybe this cooker will inspire me to invite more people over!
customer_reviews.author: Melkor

customer_reviews.title: Great cooker. So many uses.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooker. I have several slow cookers and they are PERFECT for gatherings. I use this to make slow cooker ribs and breakfast casseroles. Be careful of the high settings, it can be easy to overcook items and dry out your dish. I use liners to make the clean up even easier! The unit is solid, the locking sides are just what you need when going somewhere with your dish and the handles are supporting when transporting the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Fix-it With Fran

customer_reviews.title: simple to use, great size
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple to use cooker with quick, efficient on and off controls. It is an ample sized unit, good for boned meats. The ceramic parts are easy to clean. Good to have locking mechanism. A winner!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: the perfect size for family sized casserole dishes
customer_reviews.text: the perfect size for family sized casserole dishes! Lasagna, shepherd's pie and even apple crisp all were made to perfection in here!
customer_reviews.author: The Homesteading Hippy

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 33444 Casserole Slow Cooker, Silver
product_meta.description: Make easy one-dish meals: casseroles, lasagne, desserts & more in the Hamilton Beach 3.5 quart casserole slow cooker.
feature_bullets: Easy one-dish meals: casseroles, lasagne, desserts & more
Cook and serve in the same dish
Oven and dishwasher safe removable stoneware
Stay or go clip-tight sealed lid reduces messy spills and makes Travel easy

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars52 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
